title: Artichoke, Cranberry Bean And Arugula Salad
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Artichoke, Cranberry Bean And Arugula Salad a try. Watching your figure? This gluten free, dairy free, and vegetarian recipe has 641 calories, 28g of protein, and 23g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 1 and costs $2.5 per serving. A mixture of cranberry beans, artichoke, lemons, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. To use up the lemons you could follow this main course with the Blackberry Lemon Chess Pie w/ Honey Jumbleberry Sauce. How I won the SF Food Wars â€“ Pie or Die Competition as a dessert. 34 people were impressed by this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 35 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 92%. This score is amazing. Try Artichoke Arugula Salad, Arugulan And Baby Artichoke Salad, and Avocado Artichoke Arugula & Spinach Salad for similar recipes.
